section.title: Changing the Service Offering for a VM
section.para: To upgrade or downgrade the level of compute resources available to a virtual machine, you can change the VM's compute offering.

listitem.para: Log in to the CloudPlatform UI as a user or admin.
In the left navigation, click Instances.
Choose the VM that you want to work with.

Click the Stop button to stop the VM
StopButton.png: button to stop a VM

Click the Change Service button
ChangeServiceButton.png: button to change the service of a VM . The Change service dialog box is displayed.
